A Simple Bookmark Manager

A clean and simple interface to organicze your favourite websites. Open a new browser tab and see your sites load instanly. Try it for free.

Features

Our aim is a make it quick and easy for you to acces your favourite websites.Your bookmarks syncs between your divices so you cant access them on the go.

Bookmark in one click

Organice your Bookmarks however you like. Our simple drag-and-drop interface gives your complet control over how you manage your favourites sites

Intelligent search

Our powerfull search feature will help you find saved sites in no time at all. No need to trawll through all of your bookmarks.

Share your Bookmark

Easly share your Bookmarks and collections with others. Create a shareable link that you can send at the click of a button.

Download the extension

We've got more browsers in the pipeline. Pleas do let us know if you've got a favourite you'd like us to prioritize.

Add to Chrome

Minimum version 62

Add & Install extension
Add to Firefox

Minimum version 55

Add & Install extension
Add to Opera

Minimum version 46

Add & Install extension

Here are some of our FAQs If you have any other questions you'd like answered pleas feel free to mail us.
